q: A 19-year Microsoft veteran, Satya Nadella has`` the right mix of leadership, vision and hard-core engineering chops,'' Microsoft Chief Executive Steve Ballmer said in a memo to employees, which was made public. We wanted someone who could define the future of business computing and further expand our ability to bring the cloud to business customers and developers in game-changing ways, Steve Ballmer said.
